DOC.brief_summary: Open pilot study peanut oral immunotherapy 22 child peanut allergy
DOC.detailed_description: Background Peanut allergy severe rarely resolve . Objective To test efficacy safety new oral immunotherapy protocol peanut allergy . Method 22 peanut-allergic child undergo oral challenge . Oral immunotherapy administer gradual updosing 2-weekly increment ( 8-38w ) 800mg protein ( 5 peanuts/day ) follow 30-weeks maintenance . Oral challenge repeat 6 30 week maintenance .
